verbose_text: Molecular dynamics simulation with Ser-Pro-Ser polypeptide and hematite suggests that Ser-Pro-Ser peptide binds hematite via the hydrogen bonds formed between the two serine residues and hydroxylated hematite surface, while the proline residue helps stabilize the binding by limiting the peptide flexibility.
